features: 👩‍👧 Mom made. Mom & Nature Approved: TOP makes period products that are good for girls, mom and mother earth.

🌲 Organic and Eco-Friendly: Made with 100% biodegradable organic cotton, our tampons are totally free of toxins, chemicals, synthetics, fragrances and dyes and are produced within a sustainable and ethical process.
💧 All Flow Types: We offer both a regular and super absorbency option for both light and ultra heavy periods. Plus, our tampons are made with a smooth, curved tip for a comfortable, easy insertion.
☁️ Designed by woman for women: Expands to fit your body for total comfort and leak-protection, so you can move freely all day long.
🌍 Access for All: Our mission is to educate, enlighten, and be our authentic selves so that every girl and woman on the planet has access to healthy, 100% organic, eco-loving tampons and pads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safer, superior protection delivered to your door.

No sneaky fragrances, dyes or hard-to-pronounce chemical names Leak Proof Protection, Perfect for White JeansPlant Based Applicator made of Sugar Cane (aka Planticator)No Synthetics, Pesticides, Toxins, Dyes of Fragrances100% Certified Organic Hypoallergenic Cotton

ORGANIC COTTON CONFIDENCE TOP Period Products are Planet Conscientious TOP cares about our planet and the environment we live in. Our period products: tampons, pads, and liners are planet-friendlier to reduce landfill waste. Always dispose of period products responsibly. All our products are designed with OCS certified* organic cotton and USDA certified* organic cotton and that's it. No sneaky fragrances or dyes. No chemicals with hard-to-pronounce names. Just you, cotton, and confidence. *TOP the organic project tampons are 100% Certified Organic by the Institute for Ethical and Environmental, Nr. Certificato GOTS 2010-009 (GLOBAL ORGANIC TEXTILE STANDARD (GOTS)) 12/31/2019

Better for You Our 100% organic cotton tampons and pads are highly absorbent, naturally hypoallergenic, and seriously strong. (just like you!) Better for Others For every purchase, we donate product to schools, shelters, nonprofits and organizations dedicated to helping women & girls in need. Better for the Planet All TOP period products are plant-based and planet-friendly. Free of chemicals and dyes - because our bodies and planet deserve better. two Moms. two Daughters. one Planet. We are here to educate, enlighten, and be our authentic selves so that every girl and woman on the planet has access to healthy, 100% organic, eco-loving tampons and pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Good deal. Comfortable. I like knowing that it's natural cotton. If they offered different quantities that would be great. Also it would be great if the applicators were biodegradable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love love love. Recently made the switch to organic tampons and these are great. Personally, I like the shape of these tampons and I’ve never had problems with them falling apart inside of me. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The regular ones I’m not too fond of .. very little hold. However the super was a lot better. The one thing I dislike is the applicator itself. The click aspect of it is really hard to do with one hand which is really unusual … maybe it’s TMI but the applicator has pinched me a handful of times and I have to utilize both hands to get the applicator to “click”. I wouldn’t rebuy for that reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a keeper
reviews.reviewText: I recently made the switch to chemical free tampons and then I found this brand that even has an eco friendly applicator. I love being on auto renew so I don't need to worry about buying them at the store, and I love that they expand width with absorption instead of long...helps so much. great brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Recommend. I won’t let my family or myself put chemicals and pesticide inside my body (if you know what I mean). These are thicker than Tampax. That’s great for the heavier bleeders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not my favorite
reviews.reviewText: In an attempt to get more “natural” I purchased several brands of organic tampons. These were not my favorite. I had issues with leakage and the packaging was noisy. Every body is different. These were comfortable to wear and insert. I just didn’t love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for every female
reviews.reviewText: These are the best organic tampons on the market. I know, I have used many other brands. Definitely switch to TOPS. Also, they are a women-owned, inspiring company that supports young girls and important causes that are tied to their mission.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy I found these
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for a trip and used them in the pool and was so happy they worked! They were comfortable and pretty absorbent, didn’t have any leaks!
